alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:45PM MDT until July 02 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sheridan County in northeastern Montana... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 245 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Port Of Raymond, or 19 miles north of Plentywood, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Port Of Raymond, Comertown and Dooley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
